footer.description: Professional guidance and personal transformation in Morocco

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Transformation?
cta.description: Whether to support your organization or for your personal journey, let's schedule a conversation to explore how we can work together.

hero.subtitle: Individual Coaching
hero.title: Define Success on Your Own Terms
hero.description: Certified Coach & Team (EMCC accreditation) support that combines the rigor of professional coaching with the depth of contemplative practices. For transformation that respects your rhythm and boundaries.

individual.title: Individual Coaching
individual.description: Personalized support to explore your challenges, clarify your vision and navigate your professional journey on your own terms.

career.title: Career Coaching
career.description: Professional guidance, career transitions (upward, lateral or reflective), and leadership development for executives and entrepreneurs.

life.title: Life Coaching
life.description: Deep personal transformation, harmonious work-life integration, burnout prevention and alignment with your values.

approach.subtitle: My Approach
approach.title: Integrative & Contemplative Coaching
approach.description: My unique approach combines the effectiveness of professional coaching with the depth of contemplative practices.

step1.title: Clarification & Exploration
step1.description: Together we explore your aspirations, challenges and patterns to create a clear vision of your path.

step2.title: Inner Transformation
step2.description: Through contemplative practices and coaching tools, we activate your potential for transformation.

step3.title: Action & Anchoring
step3.description: We translate your insights into concrete actions and create practices to sustainably anchor changes.

testimonial.quote: Hajar has this rare ability to create a space that is both professional and deeply human. Her approach allowed me not only to clarify my professional vision, but also to reconnect with what really matters to me.
testimonial.author: Sophie, Marketing Director

cta.title: Let's Begin Your Journey
cta.description: The first session is a complimentary 30-minute discovery session to explore your needs and see if we're aligned to work together.

hero.subtitle: Yogic Practices & Programs
hero.title: Transform Your Life Through Yoga
hero.description: Classical Hatha Yoga taught by an Isha Foundation certified teacher, with deep understanding of contemporary world challenges. Classes, retreats and programs for a practice that integrates into your life.

classes.subtitle: Regular Classes
classes.title: Join Us on the Mat
classes.description: Weekly classes in small groups for in-depth practice and personalized guidance.

hatha.title: Traditional Hatha Yoga
hatha.description: Classical yoga practice with focus on asanas (postures), pranayama (breathing) and meditation. All levels welcome.

restorative.title: Restorative Yoga
restorative.description: Gentle and deeply relaxing practice with long-held postures. Ideal for recovery and stress management.

meditation.title: Meditation & Pranayama
meditation.description: Sessions dedicated to yogic breathing techniques and guided meditation. All levels, beginners welcome.

freeTrial.title: Free Trial Class
freeTrial.description: New to yoga? Come try your first class for free, no commitment.

retreats.subtitle: Retreats & Programs
retreats.title: Transformational Experiences
retreats.description: Retreats, workshops and trainings that combine traditional yogic practices and personal development in inspiring locations across Morocco.

atlas.title: Yoga & Meditation Retreat in the Atlas
atlas.description: Total immersion in traditional yogic practice in the heart of the Atlas Mountains. Yoga, meditation, contemplative hiking and local cuisine.

philosophy.subtitle: My Philosophy
philosophy.title: Yoga as a Path of Transformation
philosophy.description: For me, yoga is much more than a physical practice. It's a path of deep transformation that touches all aspects of our being - body, mind, heart and spirit.

tradition.title: Authentic Tradition
tradition.description: Trained in the traditional lineage of Hatha Yoga, I teach practices in their authentic form, respectful of ancestral wisdom.

inclusive.title: Inclusive Approach
inclusive.description: Yoga is for all bodies and all ages. I adapt the practice to each person with kindness and respect.

integration.title: Life Integration
integration.description: My approach helps integrate yogic teachings into daily life, for sustainable balance.

depth.title: Beyond the Physical
depth.description: The yoga I teach goes beyond postures. We explore breathing, meditation and yogic philosophy.

custom.subtitle: Personalized Program
custom.title: Let's Create Your Experience Together
custom.description: Would you like a custom program for your group, your team or a special occasion? We design unique experiences adapted to your needs.

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.description: Book your free trial class or contact us for any questions about our classes and programs.

hero.subtitle: For Organizations
hero.title: Sustainably Transform Your Organization
hero.description: Support that combines operational excellence and deep human dimension. A proven approach that reconciles performance and well-being.

services.subtitle: Our Services
services.title: Organizational Support
services.description: Tailored interventions to meet your needs, from one-off facilitation to complete transformation programs.

transformation.title: Organizational Transformation
transformation.description: Comprehensive support for your organization towards a culture of presence, collaboration and sustainable performance.

leadership.title: Conscious Leadership
leadership.description: Leadership development at all levels, grounded in self-awareness, collective intelligence and healthy boundaries for sustainable performance.

retreats.title: Corporate Retreats
retreats.description: Custom retreats in Morocco combining strategic facilitation, presence practices and rejuvenation in unique locations.

form.subtitle: Contact Form
form.title: Send Me a Message
form.description: Fill out this form and I will respond within 48 hours.

placeholders.message: Tell me about your project, your needs, your questions...

form.consent: I agree that my personal data may be used to contact me regarding my request. It will never be shared with third parties.
form.response: You will receive a response within 48 hours maximum.

q1.question: Do you offer online sessions?
q1.answer: Yes! Most of my services are available online via Zoom or in-person in Casablanca. Retreats take place in Morocco.

q2.question: How long does support last?
q2.answer: It depends on your needs. Coaching can be one-off (1-2 sessions) or spread over 3-6 months. We discuss this together during the discovery session.

q3.question: Do I need yoga experience to join classes?
q3.answer: Not at all! My classes are open to all levels. I even offer a free trial class for beginners.

q4.question: How does the first discovery session work?
q4.answer: It's a complimentary 30-minute conversation (online or in-person) to get to know each other, understand your needs and see if we're aligned to work together.
